Name: Mixx Island: Remix Vol. 2
About the game: Welcome to Mini Island! Mixx Island: Remix Vol. 2 is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty! This beautiful place was built only for simple fun! Choose the character and difficulty level that best suits you and enjoy a short, simple but colorful boss rush minigame! More About & Features Casual difficulty Hold & Gun and Boss Rush Simple Hit & Dodge Style Action. 4 types of 16 playable characters. 12 stages with 65 boss fights. Colorful and sparkling art graphics. 20 minutes to 35 minutes playtime (7 Stage) 60 minutes to 90 minutes playtime (12 Stage)
